text:
Hi,
I'm really using beta 7, but ther's no entry for it in Version field. When 
trying to view a JSP containing the following code on the same line

<%@ taglib uri="/tlds/browser" prefix="cb"%><cb:checkSession><jsp:forward 
page="/session/startLogin.jsp"/></cb:checkSession>

the following exception is thrown

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.apache.jasper.compiler.JakartaCommentGenerator.generateEndComment
(JakartaCommentGenerator.java:146)
	at 
org.apache.jasper.compiler.JspParseEventListener$GeneratorWrapper.generate
(JspParseEventListener.java:834)
	at org.apache.jasper.compiler.JspParseEventListener.generateAll
(JspParseEventListener.java:241)
	at org.apache.jasper.compiler.JspParseEventListener.endPageProcessing
(JspParseEventListener.java:197)
	at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:215)
etc.

This didn't happen with Tomcat 3.2.2. The page works well adding a newline 
between the taglib directive and the custom tag:

<%@ taglib uri="/tlds/browser" prefix="cb"%>
<cb:checkSession><jsp:forward page="/session/startLogin.jsp"/></cb:checkSession>

The custom tag only checks if some session attribute is defined and skips or 
processes its body accordingly.
creator: d.gaffuri@reply.it

creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
text:
The example in the attachment has the wrong uri.  It should be

<%@ taglib uri="http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/examples-taglib" prefix="eg" %>

instead of

<%@ taglib uri="http://java.apache.org/tomcat/examples-taglib" prefix="eg" %>

It runs fine with the change.

In any case, the oiginal report complains about an exception raised when tags
run together without a line break, which I still cannot reproduce.

In beta7 the web.xml of the example webapp used

http://java.apache.org/tomcat/examples-taglib

as the uri for the taglib. This has changed to

http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/examples-taglib

in rc1, which I downloaded yesterday. Anyway a page containing only

<%@ taglib uri="http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/examples-taglib" prefix="eg" %
><eg:log></eg:log>

on a single line still throws a NullPointerException with rc1. If you change it 
putting a newline before <eg:log> or </eg:log> (or if you change the tag in 
<eg:log/>) the exception is no more thrown.

Maybe it's a platform dependent problem (I'm using W2k Pro SP2 with JDK 1.3.1).
creator: d.gaffuri@reply.it
